email_subject: RE: Current Schedule as of 3 pm on Monday
email_body: Yevgeny, In light of this mornings events, most of the trading floor is leaving. So we will have to do the meeting tomorrow. Phillip -----Original Message----- From: Frolov, Yevgeny Sent: Monday, September 10, 2001 12:55 PM To: Allen, Phillip K. Cc: Subject: Current Schedule as of 3 pm on Monday Phillip, Here is the current schedule. You have a meeting tomorrow at 3 pm-5 pm. It will take place in the same room on 18th floor 3 AC 18 << File: Hexagon SME Sign.doc >>
